thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Ricky Luminous
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Ricky Luminous

author: Ricky Luminous
title: Ricky Luminous
text: Great selection of products on the site and no issues with the buying and shipping process. The item arrived on time and very well packaged. There was an issue with the product I purchased but customer services were extremely help and the issue was resolved very quickly. Will certainly buy from banggood again.
